headline.main: Firefighters Largely Control California Blaze as Other Fire Threatens Historic Mansion
headline.print_headline: Firefighters Largely Control California Blaze as Other Fire Threatens Historic Mansion

docs.snippet: Firefighters had a Southern California wildfire mostly surrounded on Saturday, allowing thousands of evacuated residents to return to their houses as another fire further north moved perilously close to the historic Hearst Castle, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Firefighters had a Southern California wildfire mostly surrounded on Saturday, allowing thousands of evacuated residents to return to their houses as another fire further north moved perilously close to the historic Hearst Castle, officials said.

headline.main: India Names Urjit Patel to Be Next Central Bank Chief
headline.print_headline: India Names Next Central Bank Governor

docs.snippet: The appointment of Mr. Patel, currently a deputy governor of the Reserve Bank of India, ends weeks of speculation about a successor to Raghuram Rajan....
docs.abstract: Urjit R Patel is appointed by Indian government as new governor of Reserve Bank of India; Patel will succeed Raghuram G Rajan, who is unexpectedly stepping down in September.
docs.lead_paragraph: The appointment of Mr. Patel, currently a deputy governor of the Reserve Bank of India, ends weeks of speculation about a successor to Raghuram Rajan.

headline.main: New York City Eliminates English Test for Yellow Cab Drivers
headline.print_headline: New York City Eliminates English Test for Yellow Cab Drivers

docs.snippet: New York City taxi drivers will no longer have to pass an English test under new rules designed to make it easier for immigrants to get behind the wheel of a yellow cab....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York City taxi drivers will no longer have to pass an English test under new rules designed to make it easier for immigrants to get behind the wheel of a yellow cab.

headline.main: Putting John Deere Mowers to the Test

docs.snippet: Terry Reed, a field test manager at John Deere, tests grounds equipment, including residential and commercial riding lawn mowers....
docs.abstract: Vocations column; Terry Reed, John Deere field test manager, discusses his profession and career.

byline.original: As told to PATRICIA R. OLSEN

docs.lead_paragraph: Terry Reed, a field test manager at John Deere, tests grounds equipment, including residential and commercial riding lawn mowers.

headline.main: Police Pull Down 'Favela' Built on Copacabana to Protest Games
headline.print_headline: Police Pull Down 'Favela' Built on Copacabana to Protest Games

docs.snippet: A mock favela built on Copacabana beach to protest the lack of an Olympic legacy for Rio de Janeiro's poor was broken up by police on Saturday, who said it was blocking access to the beach....
docs.lead_paragraph: A mock favela built on Copacabana beach to protest the lack of an Olympic legacy for Rio de Janeiro's poor was broken up by police on Saturday, who said it was blocking access to the beach.

headline.main: China's Chen Wins Badminton Gold; Malaysia's Lee 3rd Silver
headline.print_headline: China's Chen Wins Badminton Gold; Malaysia's Lee 3rd Silver

docs.snippet: China's Chen Long won gold Saturday in men's badminton, handing Malaysia's Lee Chong Wei his third straight Olympic silver medal and signaling Chen's place as the game's new power....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's Chen Long won gold Saturday in men's badminton, handing Malaysia's Lee Chong Wei his third straight Olympic silver medal and signaling Chen's place as the game's new power.

headline.main: Gas Station Translator, Swimmer Disagree on Gun Pointing
headline.print_headline: Gas Station Translator, Swimmer Disagree on Gun Pointing

docs.snippet: A man who helped translate conversations between Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte, his teammates and armed security guards at a gas station says a gun wasn't pointed at them during the encounter....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who helped translate conversations between Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte, his teammates and armed security guards at a gas station says a gun wasn't pointed at them during the encounter.

headline.main: Hyundai and Mitsubishi Recalling Certain Car Models
headline.print_headline: Hyundai and Mitsubishi Recalling Certain Car Models

docs.snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration says Hyundai and Mitsubishi are recalling certain car models because of problems the companies say can increase the risk of crashes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration says Hyundai and Mitsubishi are recalling certain car models because of problems the companies say can increase the risk of crashes.

headline.main: More to Come From Impressive City, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: More to Come From Impressive City, Says Guardiola

docs.snippet: Pep Guardiola was delighted with what he saw from Manchester City during their 4-1 Premier League victory at Stoke City on Saturday, but he has warned there is plenty more to come from his side....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola was delighted with what he saw from Manchester City during their 4-1 Premier League victory at Stoke City on Saturday, but he has warned there is plenty more to come from his side.

headline.main: Rio 2016 Was an 'Iconic Games', Says IOC's Bach
headline.print_headline: Rio 2016 Was an 'Iconic Games', Says IOC's Bach

docs.snippet: The Rio de Janeiro Olympics, which come to an end on Sunday, were an iconic Games despite a long list of problems and a lack of cash, International Olympic Committee (IOC) President Thomas Bach said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rio de Janeiro Olympics, which come to an end on Sunday, were an iconic Games despite a long list of problems and a lack of cash, International Olympic Committee (IOC) President Thomas Bach said on Saturday.
